turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good morning, how can i help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with ordering pizza from Bella Luna Pizzeria?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like three medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One cheese pizza, one veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And on the third, could I have sausage?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. and what type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to take crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u want thick crust for all 3?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: to confirm, the order is for 3 medium pizzas, all with thick crust, 1 cheese pizza, 1 veggie lovers, and 1 with sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $30.19 is the total. did you want me to place the order for pick up now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful, i've submitted the order. it'll b ready in 45 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much for your help. No, that was it. Thank you.
